mapper.select: select id, electricity_cabinet_id, cell_no, type, upgrade_version, history_version, upgrade_sha256_value, status, upgrade_time, finish_time, err_msg, create_time, update_time, session_id from t_ele_ota_upgrade_history where id = #{id}

select id, electricity_cabinet_id, cell_no, type, upgrade_version, history_version, upgrade_sha256_value, status, upgrade_time, finish_time, err_msg, create_time, update_time, session_id from t_ele_ota_upgrade_history limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into t_ele_ota_upgrade_history(electricity_cabinet_id, cell_no, type, upgrade_version, history_version, upgrade_sha256_value, status, upgrade_time, finish_time, err_msg, create_time, update_time, session_id) values (#{electricityCabinetId}, #{cellNo}, #{type}, #{upgradeVersion}, #{historyVersion}, #{upgradeSha256Value}, #{status}, #{upgradeTime}, #{finishTime}, #{errMsg}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{sessionId})
mapper.update:
update t_ele_ota_upgrade_history
electricity_cabinet_id = #{electricityCabinetId},
cell_no = #{cellNo},
type = #{type},
upgrade_version = #{upgradeVersion},
history_version = #{historyVersion},
upgrade_sha256_value = #{upgradeSha256Value},
status = #{status},
upgrade_time = #{upgradeTime},
finish_time = #{finishTime},
err_msg = #{errMsg},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
session_id = #{sessionId},
where id = #{id}
